tool_description: An API that provides numerous quotes said by famous Formula 1 drivers and personalities.
title: F1 drivers quotes

api_list.name: Author with his photo
api_list.description: Shows the author who have quotes saved in this API  with his photo and ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/authors/{driverid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Driver's quotes with pagination of 10 quotes each page
api_list.description: Gets 10 quotes of the driver depending on which page you input.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/{driverid}/p/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Driver's quotes by ID
api_list.description: Gets a quote by its ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/{driverid}/{quoteid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of drivers and personalities

api_list.name: Driver's quotes
api_list.description: Gets the quotes of a specific driver.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/{driverid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-drivers-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
